title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, March 21, 2011 - Northwest Premium Meats, a Nampa, Idaho, establishment is recalling approximately 2,130 pounds of smoked ham and bacon products because they contain sodium nitrite, which is not declared on the label. The products subject to recall include: Various weight individual packages...

establishment.name: Northwest Premium Meats, LLC
establishment.address:
137 N. Happy Valley Road 
  Nampa, ID 83687

impacted_products: Various weight individual packages of "HOMESTEAD NATURAL SMOKED HAM"
